Contact

BARON global optimization solver

BARON was developed by Nick Sahinidis and his research group.  It is available from The Optimization Firm, http://www.minlp.com.  For more information about BARON, please contact Nick Sahinidis or info@minlp.com.

MATLAB/BARON interface

The MATLAB/BARON interface was developed by Jonathan Currie.  For more information on the MATLAB/BARON interface, please contact Jonathan Currie and/or info@minlp.com.

 

 

The MATLAB/BARON interfarce is provided from http://www.minlp.com.
